channel.title: Pony Springs on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Pony Springs on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-93 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-93 north to Ely, Lehman Caves (Great Basin National Park), and Wells. Taken just north of Pony Springs.

item.title: US-93 North - Pony Springs
item.description: Entering the community of Pony Springs on US-93 North. Pony Springs consists of a few buildings and a state rest area.
